message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $11,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you consider $10,500? It's a small compromise for a product you know is worth much more.

I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,200? I'm willing to make a small concession, but I don't want to exceed my budget.
